channel.title: Hardware on Tiffany's Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Tiffany's Webpage

item.title: Hardware
item.description:
Desktop Computer Specs

  • Pro B55M-VC WIFI Motherboard with a AMD Ryzen 5 5600 CPU
  • Nvidia RTX 2060 Super GPU
  • 2x8gb Corsair Vengeance LPX DDR4 2666Mhz
  • 2x8gb Corsair Vengenace RGB Pro DDR4 3200Mhz
  • T500 Crucial 1TB NVMe M.2
  • Kingston 240GB SSD

Laptop

  • M1 Macbook Air 16GB Ram 512 SSD

Desk Setup

  • 27 inch LG Monitor 144Hz 2560 x 1440
  • Razer DeathAdder V3 Mouse
  • Keychron K2 Keyboard
  • Random Speaker Bar
item.content:encoded:
Desktop Computer Specs

  • Pro B55M-VC WIFI Motherboard with a AMD Ryzen 5 5600 CPU
  • Nvidia RTX 2060 Super GPU
  • 2x8gb Corsair Vengeance LPX DDR4 2666Mhz
  • 2x8gb Corsair Vengenace RGB Pro DDR4 3200Mhz
  • T500 Crucial 1TB NVMe M.2
  • Kingston 240GB SSD

Laptop

  • M1 Macbook Air 16GB Ram 512 SSD

Desk Setup

  • 27 inch LG Monitor 144Hz 2560 x 1440
  • Razer DeathAdder V3 Mouse
  • Keychron K2 Keyboard
  • Random Speaker Bar
